data.text: @FilmNewsNos @Jason_Priestley @MrJerryOC @TheKurtFuller @LizVassey @maxcaulfield @Knighttues @joedietl I worked with Jerry again on the Defenders. I got winded walking from my car to the set. It troubled me. 3 wks later. triple bi-pass.

@Tobolowsky @FilmNewsNos @Jason_Priestley @MrJerryOC @TheKurtFuller @LizVassey @maxcaulfield @joedietl I had so much fun doing this film!  Wasn't a fan of being naked on the beach but everyone was a great sport.  Glad to have been a part of it

@FilmNewsNos @Jason_Priestley @MrJerryOC @TheKurtFuller @LizVassey @maxcaulfield @Knighttues @joedietl Such a good movie!! Great script. Unexpected. Jason and Jerry are so good. I met Kurt Fuller - wonderful actor. We spoke in sign language.
